title: Rascals
description: A generously proportioned Yorkshire biscuit which is a cross between a fruit scone and a rock cake. Great for baking with children.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz plain flour, sifted, plus extra for dusting
120g/4oz mixed dried fruit (such as currants, sultanas and raisins)
1 free-range egg, beaten with a little milk
butter or clotted cream, to serve
